info.name: Weapon Masteries
info.description: The Weapon Masteries from the 2024 Players' Handbook.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

description.p: At 2nd level, you adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options. You canâ€™t take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.
While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.
When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.
Instead of taking a fighting style, you can choose to know 2 Druid cantrips.
When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.
